header_text: You recently turned in a big project at work.  You decide to re-read your submitted work, and realize that you accidentally deleted a section you meant to include. Given that you accidentally made this deletion, you think that you are likely to receive positive feedback.

elements.Text: Are you going to get positive feedback on your project?

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
